Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by California in 1983...
Injured on 8/10/1984 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1987, off Bryn Smith (NYY)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1987, off Dave Downs (NYY)...
Injured on 5/26/1987 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/16/1988 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/4/1990 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 5/2/1992...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1996...
